Description: Reverend Charger HB - Violin Brown Condition: Gently used Charger HB in a stunning violin brown. Serial Number: 29142, Weight: 7.95lbs. The Charger HB is stacked with Special H pickups in the bridge and neck for the ultimate modern rock shredder. It features a Korina solidbody, a bolt-on roasted maple neck with a comfortable medium oval profile, and a bass contour knob. It's equipped with high quality Reverend pin-lock tuners and a Tune-O-Matic bridge with stop tail.
